title: Don't Take the Bait!
itunes:author: Guests: Matt & Lisa Jacobson
itunes:summary:
When your teenager is rude to you, it can be easy to lash out. John and Danny discuss why setting boundaries is better than responding in anger to your teen. Featuring Matt and Lisa Jacobson.


Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.


Get Matt and Lisa Jacobson's book "100 Ways to Love Your Daughter" or their book "100 Ways to Love Your Son" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-10-07?refcd=1181601


Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/dont-take-the-bait/#featured-resource-cta


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
